Package ca.phon.audio

Class EmptySampled

java.lang.Object
ca.phon.audio.AbstractSampled
ca.phon.audio.EmptySampled
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sampled
public final class EmptySampled
extends AbstractSampled
Empty audio samples of specified length and format.
